userPosts

public org.json.JSONObject userPosts(int id,
                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)
Description copied from interface: ForrstAPI
Returns a user's posts by User ID

Specified by:
userPosts in interface ForrstAPI
Parameters:
id - User ID
options - is a map & can contain: type [optional] Post type (code, snap, link, question) limit [optional, default = 10, max = 25] number of posts to return per page after [optional] if given, return posts with an ID lower than after
Returns:
JSON response containing: posts [{ id, tiny_id, post_type, post_url, created_at, updated_at, user { ... }, published, public, title, url, content, description, formatter_description, like_count, comment_count, snaps { mega_url, keith_url, large_url, medium_url, small_url, thumb_url, original_url } }]

public org.json.JSONObject userPosts(java.lang.String username,
                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)
Description copied from interface: ForrstAPI
Returns a user's posts by Username

Specified by:
userPosts in interface ForrstAPI
Parameters:
username - Username
options - is a map & can contain: type [optional] Post type (code, snap, link, question) limit [optional, default = 10, max = 25] number of posts to return per page after [optional] if given, return posts with an ID lower than after
Returns:
JSON response containing: posts [{ id, tiny_id, post_type, post_url, created_at, updated_at, user { ... }, published, public, title, url, content, description, formatter_description, like_count, comment_count, snaps { mega_url, keith_url, large_url, medium_url, small_url, thumb_url, original_url } }]

postsShow

public org.json.JSONObject postsShow(int id)
Description copied from interface: ForrstAPI
Return data about a single post by Post ID. Note: For questions, content is the question. For code, content contains the code snippet. For code, snaps, and links, description is the post description; it is not used for questions.

Specified by:
postsShow in interface ForrstAPI
Parameters:
id - Post ID
Returns:
JSON response containing: id, tiny_id, post_type, post_url, created_at, updated_at, user: { ... }, published, public, title, url, content, description, formatted_description, like_count, comment_count, tag_string, tags [ ... ]

postsShow

public org.json.JSONObject postsShow(java.lang.String tinyId)
Description copied from interface: ForrstAPI
Return data about a single post by Post Tiny ID. Note: For questions, content is the question. For code, content contains the code snippet. For code, snaps, and links, description is the post description; it is not used for questions.

Specified by:
postsShow in interface ForrstAPI
Parameters:
tinyId - Post Tiny ID
Returns:
JSON response containing: id, tiny_id, post_type, post_url, created_at, updated_at, user: { ... }, published, public, title, url, content, description, formatted_description, like_count, comment_count, tag_string, tags [ ... ]

public org.json.JSONObject postsAll(int after)
Description copied from interface: ForrstAPI
Returns a list of all posts in reverse-chron order after given ID

Specified by:
postsAll in interface ForrstAPI
Parameters:
after - [optional] if passed, only return posts posted after this ID
Returns:

postsList in interface ForrstAPI
